column2: Navia Markets Ltd is looking out for a Risk Management professional who has experience with Risk management in Equity and Commodity segments of Stock Market . Here is the detailed responsibilities overview: Effective risk management in commodity & equity segments. Preparing various reports, which include estimation of the comfort levels of clients for the next trading day. Based on the current days trading, Monitoring SPAN margin & these reports draw conclusions, which help in decision-making. Margin shortfall follows up & Square off the client position without any credit risk. Determination of value at risk and implementing the same in the fluctuating market.  To check on a day-to-day basis the credit Risk for every client on their exposure to the market and take necessary steps to make the clients maintain adequate margins. Preferred candidate profile  : - Min 1 year of experience with Risk Management in equity and commodities market. - Learning Attitude. - Good communication in English. - Fluency with computer systems. Perks and benefits: -CL,SL and Privileged Leaves. - Medical and Accidental Insurance coverage. - Gratuity and PF benefit.
column11: Risk Management, Stock Broking, Financial Risk Management, Communication Skills, Financial Risk, Risk Analysis, Financial Markets, Credit Risk Analysis, Equity Market
